Major_Arcs.title: Dinosaur Sales and Dinny's Journey
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the narrative thread from a clam debt trick to the trading and resale of a dinosaur named Dinny, culminating in Dinny's unexpected return and defense.

sub_scenes.title: The Clam Debt Trick
sub_scenes.description: King Guz is tricked by Guz into repaying a debt using a staged drowning.

sub_scenes.title: Bronto Soreness and Trade-in Consideration
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop encounters a man with an old, clumsy dinosaur, leading to a conversation about trading it in.

sub_scenes.title: Honest Zog's Dealership
sub_scenes.description: The scene shifts to Honest Zog's dinosaur dealership, showcasing various dinosaurs for sale.

narrative_arcs.title: Honest Zog's Dinosaur Dealership and Shopping

sub_scenes.title: Zippy Dinosaur Test Ride and Purchase
sub_scenes.description: A customer test-rides a dinosaur, experiences an unexpected pinch, but still decides to buy it.

narrative_arcs.title: The Zippy Dinosaur's Test Ride and Pinch
Concluding the Dinosaur Deal After Test Ride

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Farewell and Resale
sub_scenes.description: Dinny is traded in and put up for sale at Zog's dealership after an emotional farewell.

narrative_arcs.title: Dinny on Sale at the Dinosaur Dealership

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Return and Defense
sub_scenes.description: A dinosaur sale goes wrong when the dinosaur is revealed to be Dinny, who returns to Zog and is defended from mistreatment.

narrative_arcs.title: Dinosaur Sales Pitch and Unpleasant Test Ride

Major_Arcs.title: Relationship Troubles and Fishing Trip
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on romantic relationships, starting with Alley and Coola's breakup and transitioning to a fishing trip where misogynistic views and interpersonal conflicts arise.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Invitation and Breakup
sub_scenes.description: Alley invites Coola fishing, but she rejects him, leading to a breakup and dramatic exit.

sub_scenes.title: Misogynistic Fishing Trip
sub_scenes.description: Cavemen on a fishing trip express misogynistic views and get annoyed by each other's fishing habits.

narrative_arcs.title: Fishing Trip Annoyances: Baiting and Loud Talking
Confrontation and Apology on the Fishing Trip

sub_scenes.title: Gossip and Investigation of Coola
sub_scenes.description: Gossip about Coola's loyalty leads to an investigation and a potential misunderstanding involving Cherie.

narrative_arcs.title: Gossip and Competition for Coola's Affections
Skepticism and the Challenge to Verify Coola's Loyalty

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Conflicts and Advice
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores romantic jealousy and conflict, leading to strategic advice on romance, albeit unconventional.

sub_scenes.title: Jealous Confrontation and Misunderstanding
sub_scenes.description: Jealousy erupts into violence, followed by a clarification of misdirected aggression and affectionate comfort.

narrative_arcs.title: Misdirected Aggression and a Name Revealed
Affectionate Comfort and a Confused Realization

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Strategy Session
sub_scenes.description: An angry caveman receives unconventional romantic advice, including defining romance and a 'French fried freak' technique.

Major_Arcs.title: More Romantic Entanglements and Misunderstandings
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc continues to explore romantic themes with jealousy, gift-giving gone wrong, and further relationship misunderstandings.

sub_scenes.title: Jealousy and Crocodile Interruption
sub_scenes.description: Romantic gestures are interrupted by jealousy and a sudden crocodile attack, followed by a critique of vulgarity.

narrative_arcs.title: Critique of Vulgarity and Subdued Crocodile

sub_scenes.title: Jealous Rage and Romantic Scene
sub_scenes.description: Jealous rage is expressed violently, contrasting with a separate romantic scene observed by a bewildered caveman.

sub_scenes.title: Misinterpreted Kiss and Infidelity Accusations
sub_scenes.description: A confrontation arises from a misinterpreted kiss, and infidelity accusations are publicly made.

sub_scenes.title: Alley's Romantic Shift and Male Commentary
sub_scenes.description: Alley attempts a new romantic approach, observed and commented on by other cavemen.

narrative_arcs.title: Alley's Romantic Resolution and New Approach

Major_Arcs.title: The Twitch Dance Craze
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc revolves around a new dance craze called 'the twitch' and its surprising and humorous consequences, from injuries to hospitalization.

sub_scenes.title: Twitch Dance Injuries
sub_scenes.description: Injuries resulting from the 'New Twist' dance are observed and discussed.

narrative_arcs.title: Consequences of the New Twist Dance

sub_scenes.title: Pressure to Dance
sub_scenes.description: Coola pressures Alley to learn the 'twitch' dance for an upcoming party.

narrative_arcs.title: Pressure to Participate in the Twitch Dance

sub_scenes.title: Dance Lessons and Identity Reveal
sub_scenes.description: Alley agrees to dance lessons, leading to mishaps and a surprising identity reveal.

sub_scenes.title: Nighttime Twitch and Hospitalization
sub_scenes.description: Nighttime discussion about the twitch dance leads to humiliation and a reveal of widespread hospitalizations due to the dance.

narrative_arcs.title: Nighttime Twitch Discussion and Mysterious Fear

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel to Spain and Bullfight
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc involves time travel to 16th century Spain for research, leading to romantic interruptions, cultural misunderstandings, and participation in a bullfight.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Idea and Preparation
sub_scenes.description: Researchers plan to use a time machine to gather information about 16th century Spain.

narrative_arcs.title: Researching 16th Century Spain and the Time Machine Idea
Preparing the Time Machine for Oop

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Interlude Interrupted
sub_scenes.description: A romantic moment between Alley and Ooola is interrupted by time travel.

narrative_arcs.title: Romantic Moonlight Scene with Alley and Ooola
Arguing and Agreeing to a Kiss
Time Machine Activation and Unexpected Transportation

sub_scenes.title: Arrival in 20th Century and Spanish Assignment
sub_scenes.description: Alley and Ooola arrive in the 20th century and are given an assignment related to Spain.

narrative_arcs.title: Welcome to the 20th Century and the Spanish Assignment
Frustration over Interrupted Kiss and Justification for Time Travel
Postponed Kiss and Dispatch to Ancient Spain

sub_scenes.title: Arrival in Spain and Serenade Misunderstanding
sub_scenes.description: Alley arrives in Spain and gets involved in a misunderstanding related to a serenade.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in Spain and Initial Confusion
The Serenade and the Annoyed Observer

sub_scenes.title: Bullfight Preparations and Performance
sub_scenes.description: Alley's intervention leads to further misunderstandings, apologies, and ultimately, participation in a bullfight.

narrative_arcs.title: Attack on the Serenader and Balcony Woman's Initial Reaction
Apology, Impending Consequences, and the Manager's Arrival
Urgency to Start the Bullfight and Crowd's Demand
Spectator Commentary on Bullfighter's Appearance and Weapon Choice
Doubt and Reassurance about the Bullfighter's Courage

Major_Arcs.title: Return from Spain and Unexpected Denial
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc marks Oop's return from Spain but introduces a twist with his unexpected denial of a promised kiss, hinting at discoveries made during his mission.

sub_scenes.title: Decision to Retrieve Oop and Courting Scene
sub_scenes.description: The decision is made to bring Oop back, juxtaposed with a brief courting scene.

narrative_arcs.title: Decision to Retrieve Oop for Information
Courting Scene with Spanish Lady and Gentleman

sub_scenes.title: Oop's Abduction and Return
sub_scenes.description: Oop returns in a captured state, causing concern and relief.

narrative_arcs.title: Oop's Abduction and Jane's Relief at His Return

sub_scenes.title: Promised Kiss and Denial
sub_scenes.description: The promised kiss is brought up, but Oop unexpectedly denies it, creating mystery.

narrative_arcs.title: Jane Reminds Oop of Promised Kiss
Oop's Unexpected Denial of Kiss and Revelation

Major_Arcs.title: King for a Day and Temporary Reign
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the humorous reality of temporary kingship, from initial enthusiasm to the chaos of a temporary replacement and the original king's manipulative return.

sub_scenes.title: King for a Day and Disappointment
sub_scenes.description: The 'King for a Day' experiences the tiring reality of kingship.

narrative_arcs.title: King for a Day and the Reality of Throne Life

sub_scenes.title: Temporary King Appointment and Rejection
sub_scenes.description: The 'King' appoints a temporary replacement who faces immediate hostility and the original king's return.

narrative_arcs.title: King's Planned Absence and Temporary Replacement
Proclamation and Respect Demand for Temporary King
Reign of Rocks: The Temporary King's Downfall
Aftermath and the Original King's Return

Major_Arcs.title: Guz's Substitute and Clam Dispute Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc features Guz's substitute experiencing the downsides of Guz's life and a separate clam dispute that is resolved by a wise elder.

sub_scenes.title: Guz's Misunderstood Leisure and Oompa's Ire
sub_scenes.description: Guz's substitute's leisurely time is disrupted by Oompa's anger and demands.

narrative_arcs.title: Guz's Misunderstood Leisure and Oompa's Ire
Guz's Tub Contemplation and Vacation Insight

sub_scenes.title: Game Cheating and Money Fight
sub_scenes.description: Brief scenes of game cheating accusation and a money fight.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusation of Cheating in a Game

sub_scenes.title: Clam Dispute and Wise Elder Resolution
sub_scenes.description: A dispute over found clams is investigated and resolved by a wise elder.

narrative_arcs.title: The Mystery of the Missing Clams and Royal Inquiry
Royal Deduction and Wise Elder Intervention in the Clam Dispute
Wise Elder's Resolution: 'Nothing Left to Fight About'

Major_Arcs.title: Moonina Palace and King's Troubles
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc takes place in Moonina Palace, showing the king dealing with disturbances, financial impropriety, and health concerns, culminating in a surprise attack.

sub_scenes.title: Moonina Palace Racket and Money Keeping
sub_scenes.description: Disturbance outside Moonina Palace leads to investigation and accusation of money keeping.

sub_scenes.title: Dinner and Surprise Attack
sub_scenes.description: Dinner scene at Moonina Palace turns from pleasant to unpleasant and ends with a surprise attack on the king.

Major_Arcs.title: Apologies and New Rulership Offer
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc features apologies between Guz and Oompah, the former king's relief at losing his crown, and a new offer of rulership to a young caveman.

sub_scenes.title: Apologies and Freedom from Kingship
sub_scenes.description: Apologies are exchanged, and the former king expresses joy at being free from kingship.

sub_scenes.title: Offer of Rulership and Measuring Scene
sub_scenes.description: A young caveman is offered rulership, juxtaposed with a comedic scene of measuring with a board.

narrative_arcs.title: Measuring with a Board and Strange Duck

Major_Arcs.title: The Barberous Act
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the 'Barberous Act,' a forced shaving service that becomes surprisingly popular.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction and Interruption
sub_scenes.description: The 'Barberous Act' is foreshadowed, and a bearded man abruptly leaves Ooola.

sub_scenes.title: Forced Shave and Tonsorial Parlor
sub_scenes.description: The nature of the 'Barberous Act' is revealed as forced shaving, which becomes a business in 'Moo Tonsorial Parlor'.

Major_Arcs.title: Time Machine Malfunction
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on an inventor's attempt to bring Oop to the present, which results in a time machine malfunction and the arrival of a Roman Centurion instead.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Setup and Malfunction
sub_scenes.description: An inventor sets up his time machine to bring Oop to the present, but it malfunctions, bringing a Roman Centurion instead.
